name: NeoGuard
author: joeal@example.com
description: NeoGuard - Java Obfuscation Web Application powered by Skidfuscator. Upload JAR files and obfuscate them with powerful transformers.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y curl wget unzip

cd /mnt/server

# Download NeoGuard JAR (replace with actual download URL)
echo "Downloading NeoGuard..."
if [ -n "${NEOGUARD_VERSION}" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/yourusername/neoguard/releases/download/${NEOGUARD_VERSION}/neo-guard-${NEOGUARD_VERSION}.jar"
else
    # Default to latest release
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/yourusername/neoguard/releases/latest/download/neo-guard-1.0.0.jar"
fi

curl -Lo neoguard.jar "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" || wget -O neoguard.jar "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

# Create required directories
mkdir -p data uploads output configs libs mappings

# Download Skidfuscator
echo "Downloading Skidfuscator..."
curl -Lo libs/skidfuscator.jar "https://github.com/skidfuscatordev/skidfuscator-java-obfuscator/releases/latest/download/skidfuscator.jar" || wget -O libs/skidfuscator.jar "https://github.com/skidfuscatordev/skidfuscator-java-obfuscator/releases/latest/download/skidfuscator.jar"

echo "Installation complete!"
